original_text: Arise, go to Padanaram, to the house of Bethuel thy mother's father; and take thee a wife from thence of the daughers of Laban thy mother's brother.
korean_text: 일어나 밧단아람으로 가서 네 외조부 브두엘의 집에 이르러 거기서 네 외삼촌 라반의 딸 중에서 아내를 맞이하라

sentences.original_text: to the house of Bethuel thy mother's father
and take thee a wife from thence
of the daughters of Laban thy mother's brother
